title: Kessler researchers link spatial neglect after stroke with poor outcomes (Kessler Foundation)
text: ( Source : Kessler Foundation ) Stroke patients with spatial neglect less likely to return home ; more likely to fall and have longer stays September 29 , 2015 . Using the Kessler Foundation Neglect Assessment Process (KF-NAP), Kessler
